title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: When resizing a view like the Navigator to a smaller size on Linux using build 20011127 (not observed on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items, including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X), move below the label. This behavior may confuse users.
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux using build 20011127, the tool items, including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X), move below the label.
EB: When a view is resized smaller, the tool items, including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X), should remain aligned with the label and not move down.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe that the tool items, including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X), move below the label.
